item.title: Changeset [1541]: MT import fixes from 2fargon. Bug 0000227.
item.dc:creator: rboren

item.title: Ticket #229 (generic_ping does not return argument) created
item.dc:creator: Curioso
item.description: genric_ping does not return its argument. It is called by do_action/apply_filters, which means that other filters will not get the post_id.

item.title: Ticket #228 (do_action 'delete_post' gets wrong argument) created
item.dc:creator: Curioso
item.description: When deleting a post in wp-admin/post.php do_action is called with argument post_ID, while the post ID is actually kept in post_id at that point.

item.title: Ticket #227 (Fix for import-mt.php) created
item.dc:creator: 2fargon
item.description:
import-mt.php was not ascribing the authors properly. user_nickname and user_login were mixed up. (The form showed 'user_nickname's and the script checked for 'user_login' before creating new authors.

Also, upgrade_all() was missing.

The attached diff fixes both problems. import-mtnew.php is the fixed import-mt.php attached for reference.

item.title: Changeset [1540]: Search permalinks complete with feed and paging support.
item.dc:creator: rboren
item.description: Search permalinks complete with feed and paging support.

item.title: Ticket #220 (GB Pound sign problems) updated
item.dc:creator: TigerDE2
item.description: Looks as if this would be an iso/utf change issue. This _might_ be of some help: ​http://wordpress.org/support/3/3191

item.title: Ticket #226 (excerpt not being autogenerated from body) created
item.dc:creator: brehaut
item.description: in the most recent WP code, the excerpt text appears to not being generated at all when a post is created or modified.

item.title: Ticket #225 (wp_list_cats uses hardcoded date format) created
item.dc:creator: adam
item.description:
It seems that

wp_list_cats('optiondates=1');

Appends the date in only European format (date/month), rather than using an option. It looks like the format is hardcoded in the function.
